vocabInfos.mediumDef:
1) to overlook, look down or out, overhang, look out and down
1a) (Niphal) to lean over (and look), look down
1b) (Hiphil) to look down, look down upon
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 俯視, 向下或向外看, 懸伸
1a) (Niphal) 傾身看, 俯視
1b) (Hiphil) 往下看
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 俯视, 向下或向外看, 悬伸
1a) (Niphal) 倾身看, 俯视
1b) (Hiphil) 往下看
